### Info

ID: `download_file`  
Namespace: `download`

### Command

```bash
nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline -r main_build -main-script target/nextflow/download/download_file/main.nf --help
```

### Links
[Source](https://github.com/openpipelines-bio/openpipeline/blob/main/src/download/download_file){.btn-action .btn-sm .btn-info .btn role="button"}
:::

Download a file.


## Argument group

### Arguments



:::{.column-body-outset}
|Name        |Description                 |Attributes                                                                                                                                      |
|:-----------|:---------------------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|`--input`   |URL to a file to download.  |`string`, required, example: "https://cf.10xgenomics.com/samples/cell-exp/3.0.0/pbmc_1k_protein_v3/pbmc_1k_protein_v3_raw_feature_bc_matrix.h5" |
|`--output`  |Path where to store output. |`file`, required, example: "pbmc_1k_protein_v3_raw_feature_bc_matrix.h5"                                                                        |
|`--verbose` |Increase verbosity          |`boolean_true`                                                                                                                                  |
:::
